page.title: 19SHOPPING IN ASHILL
page.content: Not just a village shop but a place where knowledge is passed on and where views are exchanged. Selling a wide range of groceries and other goods we are now used as a top up for the villagers with only a few doing their main shopping here. Open from 8:30 am until 9:00 pm Thursday, Friday and Saturday, 8:30 am to 5:30 pm Monday and Tuesday and 10:00 am to 12:30 pm Sundays. Closed all day Wednesday. Increased competition from supermarkets is gradually seeing the demise of stores such as ours. Social events, dances, notices of meetings etc. are advertised and we are used to pass on messages, to act as a collecting point and ticket seller for local events. Although we offer a delivery service few of our customers actually use it.
